page.title: 07RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES
page.content: Holiday Countries. A survey was carried out to find where the families of children in Maynards Green School went on holiday. 60% stayed in England and of these 25% stayed in Sussex,15% went to Cornwall,15% to Devon,15% to Hampshire and 12% to Dorset. Of the 40% who went abroad,25% went to Spain,16% to France and 13% to Wales. Spain was popular because people liked the sun, the lack of rain and a warm sea to bathe in. Favourite Hobbies. All the children(228) in Maynards Green School were asked what their favourite hobbies were. The results were as follows:playing with Lego 17%;swimming 14%;horse riding 13%;model collecting 12%;reading 10%;fishing 9%;football 8%;bicycle riding 5%;drawing 5%;jigsaw puzzles 5%
